I would think the sukashi design represents a sickle (kama), having religio=
us significance as  symbol of Suwa shrine (Suwa myojin), and from a warrior=
's viewpoint used to signify "mowing down the enemy." 

The tsuba looks Kat=
chushi to me. I'm afraid I think you are mistaking rust for copper.  

Davi=
d Zincavage
